鼓.definition: drum; CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]; to drum; to strike; to rouse; to bulge; to swell

鼓動.definition: to urge (an activity that may be beneficial, harmful or neutral); to encourage; to agitate; to instigate; to incite; to beat; to flap (wings, a fan etc)

鼓包.definition: to bulge; to swell; a bulge; a swelling

鼓吹.definition: to agitate for; to enthusiastically promote

鼓噪.definition: (in ancient times) to beat the drums and yell (at the moment of launching into battle); to create a clamor; to make a din; to kick up a fuss about

鼓山.definition: Gushan or Kushan district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

鼓山區.definition: Gushan or Kushan district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

鼓樓.definition: a drum tower; Drum Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc

鼓樓區.definition: Gulou, the name of districts in Nanjing (in Jiangsu), Xuzhou (in Jiangsu), Fuzhou (in Fujian) and Kaifeng (in Henan)

鼓氣.definition: to puff up; to swell up; to inflate; to blow air into sth; (fig.) to encourage; to support

鼓浪嶼.definition: Gulangyu, scenic island off Xiamen 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2]

鼓盆.definition: lit. to drum on a bowl; refers to Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3] grieving for his lost wife; fig. grief for a lost wife

鼓盆之戚.definition: drumming on a bowl in grief (idiom, refers to Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3] grieving for his lost wife); fig. grief for a lost wife

鼓舌.definition: to wag one's tongue; to speak glibly

鼓舞.definition: to inspire; to encourage; to hearten; to boost (morale)

鼓起.definition: to summon one's (courage, faith etc); to puff up (one's cheeks etc); to bulge; to swell out

鼓風.definition: a forced draft (of wind, for smelting metal); blast (in blast furnace); bellows; to draw air using bellows

鼓風爐.definition: a blast furnace (in modern times); a draft assisted furnace for smelting metals

鼓鼓囊囊.definition: (idiom) (of a pocket, pouch etc) full and bulging
